page.title: 02CLYRO POST OFFICE AND SHOP
page.content: {Clyro shop}is well over a hundred years old. It serves as the village { {Post Office}and this part of the shop hasn't changed a great deal in that time.The shop was modernised recently. {Sunday Newspapers}are now sold and the open shelves now offer a {self service facility. Throughout the year people who live in and around the village come in to the shop to buy{groceries,}newspapers or to use the Post Office. Apart from these regular customers,{tourists,} also use the shop during the summer while staying at the nearby{caravan {site}or at the {Baskerville hotel. The shop sells a wide range of products from {general foods to patent {medicines and garden seeds.}One of the more recent additions to the product range is the facility for renting { {video films. }
